name: Star Wars: Sith Destroyer
description:
this is a starwars fan made game I did myself for fun, now its on Itch.io here free to download :)

FEATURES:

- 5 ACTION PACKED LEVELS

-PLAY AS A JEDI IN THE STARWARS UNIVERSE

-USE A LIGHTSABER AND FIGHT STORM TROOPERS, JEDI AND SITH

-2 DIFFERENT FORCE POWERS TO USE AGAINST THE ENEMIES

-WOLFENSTEIN 3D STYLE GAMEPLAY: FIND THE CODE CARD IN EACH LEVEL TO PROGRESS
